hadiths.text: Narrated Ruwayfi' ibn Thabit al-Ansari: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: He who believes in Allah and the Last Day must not ride on packhorse belonging to the booty of the Muslims and put it back when he has emaciated it; and he who believes in Allah and the Last Day must not wear a garment belonging to the booty of the Muslims and put it back when he made it threadbare

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَنْتَفِعُ مِنَ الْغَنِيمَةِ بِالشَّىْءِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Benefits From Something In The Spoils
